channel.title: Fluid Dynamics on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Fluid Dynamics on Home

item.title: Dynamic Mode Decomposition of Large-Scale Aerodynamic Simulations of Base-Bleed Projectiles
item.description: This study applies Dynamic Mode Decomposition to analyze and reduce CFD data of base-bleed military projectiles, identifying dominant dynamic modes of the velocity field from 2D axisymmetric simulations.

item.title: Application of Scientific Machine Learning Techniques for Fluid Dynamics Analysis
item.description: Application of machine learning techniques, informed by governing physical laws, for fluid dynamics analysis.

item.title: Modal Analysis of Fluid Dynamics
item.description: Application of the Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD) technique to identify and understand coherent structures (or modes) that dominate the spatial and temporal behavior of a fluid flow.

item.title: Numerical Methods for Simulating Transport Phenomena
item.description: Application of the numerical method of lines (NUMOL) to solve the classical problem of one-dimensional heat transfer in a cylinder.
